entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is left behind by his cruel relatives on their outings.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and is taken out for the day by his parents every year.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: A mad old lady who lives two streets away from Harry and takes care of him when he is left behind.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is cruel to him and treats him poorly.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who suggests phoning Marge but is rebuked by Aunt Petunia.

entities.name: marge
entities.description: Aunt Petunia's sister, who hates Harry and is not to be contacted.

entities.name: tibbies
entities.description: One of Mrs Figg's many cats that she shows Harry pictures of.

entities.name: snowy
entities.description: Another one of Mrs Figg's cats that she shows Harry pictures of.

entities.name: mr paws
entities.description: One of Mrs Figg's many cats that she shows Harry pictures of.

entities.name: tuffy
entities.description: The last of Mrs Figg's cats that she shows Harry pictures of.

relationships.description: Harry is left behind by his relatives and taken care of by Mrs Figg.
Aunt Petunia treats Harry poorly and speaks about him in a cruel manner.
Uncle Vernon suggests phoning Marge, but is rebuked by Aunt Petunia.
